General.Name: Grupo Famsa S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Famsa, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, operates in the retail sector in Mexico and the United States. It sells furniture, household goods, electronics, jewelry, clothing, footwear, cosmetics, and other products. The company operates a network of 264 retail stores in Mexico and 19 retail stores in Texas. Grupo Famsa, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1970 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.
General.Address: Ave. Pino SuArez No. 1202 Nte, Monterrey, NL, Mexico, 64000
